@AndyRoden1 @BBCTomEdwards The traditional ATO concept works and can be extended on the tube now but again with investment in trains and signalling and safety equipment. That could be achieved within 10-years if we started today. Mainlines perhaps some but not all. Branches too expensive to justify.

@AndyRoden1 @BBCTomEdwards The level and extent of automation and de-manning of trains and stations is unrealistic without massive investment in every operational aspect.
